title: A Winter's Pledge
description: Sage had always considered herself to be a regular and ordinary girl. But, what’s a girl to do when she finds out that she’s really a member of the royal family? Amongst new friends and foes, Sage must juggle the pressures of her new life while longing for the one she used to have. In-kind fate, she meets Caspian, the servant’s son, who makes this strange new world of hers just a little easier to cope. She knows her blood is royal but deep down her heart and soul belong among the common folk. Will Sage be able to live up to her royal expectations? Or will she crack under the pressure? A Winter’s Pledge is a modern-day fairytale graphic novel for people who love long-held secrets, rising to the challenge, and new love.Available on Amazon KDP June 2021.Follow: IG: @winterspledge ( For BTS, giveaways, and release date)Email: s.lbooksco@gmail.com
author: Shubha S. & Laetitia Picard
